_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

Characteristics of a mendicant who is bo: The Wicked One can do what he wants with them
Characteristics of a mendicant who is no: Does not approve of sensual stimuli
Does not cling to sensual stimuli
The Wicked One cannot do what he wants with them.
